Subject: Alerts Not Working.   Again.
Description: We realized today that all of our alerts have yet again stopped working. This has been a constant issue.  We swtiched to cloud hosted earlier this year and it worked then.   I just checked the alert history, there are none. See screenshot.  I went to the mail set up and sent a test email.  that worked fine.  And then we started getting random email alerts of the kind we should have been getting all along. The alerts are from April.
What_We_Know__c:
We updated some alerts that were stuck in processing and deleted + rebuilt the alert cache. The alerts should be working now.

Large amount of alerts pending. Alerts were stuck.
Next_Steps__c: Waiting on customer to confirm we can close the ticket.
Solution_Comment__c:
We updated some alerts that were stuck in processing and deleted + rebuilt the alert cache. The alerts should be working now.
